name: Zombie Road Mayhem
description:
Zombie Road Mayhem is an extremely fun road rage game featuring traffic racing while killing zombie on your way. The features beautiful environment of a deserted highway where zombies have taken control and lay waste in their path.

You as a survivor have to keep moving looking for more survivors. But while moving from town to town you come across lot of different zombies which might not be your average dumb zombies. They might try to jump on your vehicle and try to take it down with them.

You objective is to try to keep moving as long as possible while trying not to hit any of the obstacles on the highway and making sure you don't let the zombies take you down.

The game offers you 3 different vehicles to drive which are perfectly suited for a post apocalyptic journey. The cars can be upgraded to stand more damage and can be fitted with nitrous which will help you escape any hordes of zombies on the road. The Nos can also be upgraded.

Also you get an arsenal of 3 different weapons which can be purchased by in game currency. They come in handy while shooting the zombies which jump onto your car and try to pull you down.

try to stay alive as long as possible and stay on the road. you might be the last survivor.
